Sondrio is a company traditionally specialized on Italian textile artisan production. What they do best: rich cotton, wool and linen fabrics and all its countless interpretations. They produce every year approximately 6 million meters of fabrics, between yarn-dyed, piece-dyed, and ready for garment dyeing. Their know-how accrued over 120 years of textile tradition, testifying to their passion for the world of fabrics. Their fabrics are the first choice of men and women from America, Asia, Australia and Europe: yet, what they all find in Tessuti di Sondrio's world – in the variety of our textures and the multiple versions of our collections – is the perfect interpretation of their widely diverse styles

This conducts to products with high quality, sustainability and innovation customized by their experience.
